translations.These images are provided by %s. Each im: These images are provided by %s. Each image has it's own license.
translations.under an open license free of charge: under an open license free of charge
translations.You can customize your instance with ran: You can customize your instance with random background images.
translations.Here you can specify where random backgr: Here you can specify where random backgrounds should be used by default.
translations.Set random image as login background: Set random image as login background
translations.Set random image as dashboard background: Set random image as dashboard background
translations.Set custom search terms. Separate multip: Set custom search terms. Separate multiple terms by comma.
translations.You can apply effects to your background: You can apply effects to your background images.
translations.Set the vibrancy of the color: Set the vibrancy of the color
translations.Set the blur of the image: Set the blur of the image
translations.You can enable a High Visibility Mode fo: You can enable a High Visibility Mode for Legal Reasons. This will highlight the Privacy and Data Protection links on the login screen.
translations.%s is customized with random background: %s is customized with random background images.
translations.The images will be displayed as the back: The images will be displayed as the background if you choose "Default Image" as your background.
